modName: Making a Mod a Day - Day 2 - Jester Nazeem
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][u][color=#ff0000]Day 2 - Jester Nazeem[/color][/u]
[/size][size=3]Don't you just hate Nazeem and want to make him feel bad? Well this is the mod for you. This mod makes Nazeem wear Jester Clothes and that's it. Jester Nazeem is the latest and greatest mod to make Nazeem immersive. Nazeem is just 1000 thymes better than what he used to be

[/size][size=5][color=#ff7700][u]Installation[/u][/color]
[/size][size=3]Drag and Drop JesterNazeem.esp into your Skyrim Data folder.[/size]

[size=5][u][color=#0000ff]Compatibility[/color][/u]
[/size][size=3]Jester Nazeem is compatible with any mod that doesn't effect Nazeem.[/size]
author: RandomShoeMan
